          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Etwas chemische Reaktionen des Kalksteins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelques réactions chimiques de pierre à chaux</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates some chemical reactions of limestone. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht etwas chemische

verwendet werden.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre quelques réactions

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra algumas reações químicas
